description: This file defines a custom exception class `SimpleBankingGlobalException` used for error handling within the `com.javatodev.finance.exception` package, extending RuntimeException and incorporating Lombok annotations for boilerplate code reduction.

classes.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException
classes.description: A custom unchecked exception for global error handling in the banking application, containing error code and message fields.

methods.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor that creates an exception instance with a specific error message.
